passages.text:
You are running away from the Texas Chainsaw Massacre after you have escaped his clutches at night. He is on the hunt for you and could be anywhere!

[[Go to corn field->CornField]]
[[Go to shed->Shed]]
[[Go to road->Road]]
[[Go to house->House]]
passages.name: Outside

passages.text:
You hide in the cornfield outside of his house hoping it will deceive him, but you hear rustling and see cornstalks moving nearby.

[[Go to shed->Shed]]
[[Go to road->Road]]
[[Go to house->House]] 
[[Stay hidden->Cornfield2]]
passages.name: CornField

passages.text:
You hide in the Shed outside the killers house, hoping he won't find you there. After 30 minutes of hiding, you hear tools being knocked over.

[[Go to road->Road]]
[[Go to cornfield->CornField]] 
[[Go to house->House]]
[[Stay in shed->Shed2]]
passages.name: Shed

passages.text:
You make a run for the main road, hoping the Texas Chainsaw Massacre will not catch up to you. All of a sudden, you see car lights driving towards you.

[[Go to car->Car]]
[[Wait for car->Wait]]
passages.name: Road

passages.text: You run into the killer's home and are immediately greeted by his sister. She kills you straight away.
passages.name: House

passages.text: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre sees you hiding and kills you.
passages.name: Shed2

passages.text: The killer finds you and you are dead.
passages.name: Cornfield2

passages.text:
The car sees you waiving your hands for help and picks you up. The stranger offers you a ride to the nearest Town.

[[Go to town->Town]]
[[Ask to call someone first->Call]]
passages.name: Car

passages.text: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre grabs you before the car could see you and you are dead.
passages.name: Wait

passages.text: Before you get the town, the stranger reveals himself to be the brother of the killer and stabs you. You are dead.
passages.name: Town

passages.text:
You make a call to the police and tell them where your general location. Before you could finish, the stranger tries to stab you!

[[Try to fight->Fight]]
[[Jump out car->Jump]]
passages.name: Call

passages.text: You try to fight the driver and the car swerves and slams in to a pole. Both you and the stranger are dead on impact.
passages.name: Fight

passages.text:
You open the car door and roll out onto the side of the road, leaving you pretty banged up. You realize the stranger's phone is still in next you, but is broken.

[[Wait for police->Wait2]]
[[Run to the woods->Woods]]
passages.name: Jump

passages.text:
You run through the woods for a while and see a different light from the car.

[[Go to lights->Lights]]
[[Go away from lights->Away]]
passages.name: Woods

passages.text: The stranger turns around and runs you over. You are dead on impact.
passages.name: Wait2

passages.text: You find the town the stranger said he would take you to earlier and find the nearest cop. You escaped the Texas Chainsaw Massacre!
passages.name: Lights

passages.text: You run away from the lights and instead end back up on the road you were just on. The killer's brother sees you and runs you over. You die on impact.
passages.name: Away
